## Container.setStore() method

Replace the store with an all new set of values

Signature:

```typescript
setStore(repository: Repository): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                                    | Description |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| repository | [Repository](/api/container/repository) |             |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
container.setStore({
  new: ["store", "contents"],
});
```
